message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase a product that I believe will be of great value to you. While I can't disclose specific details, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me.  I'm offering it to you for $2000000, knowing this is a significant investment.  If you're interested, I'd be happy to answer any questions you might have.  Ultimately, I believe this could be a mutually beneficial arrangement.
